content.rendered:
The Office of the Registrar assists students with registration, helps maintain academic records, process transcript requests and assists with course catalog maintenance and class scheduling. The Office of the Registrar releases academic record information in compliance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA). 

 

If you need assistance with transferring courses, visit the Transfer and Evaluation Center. 

If you need assistance with planning your courseload, you can connect with your assigned advisor. For general advising questions, visit Academic Advising. 

Are you a graduate student? Visit Graduate Academic Services.
